overview:
Jeremy Seltzer is a business development professional and retail marketing strategist in the NYC tech start-up scene. Jeremy currently serves as the Director of Business Development for Wrapp.

Jeremy served as the Director of Strategic Development for CleanEdison, now the largest green jobs training organization in the United States. Jeremy has consulted for a number of Startups, including Getaround, Relayrides, Waze, SpaceSplitter, and WayBetter. Jeremy now serves as the Associate Director of Business Development, North America at Wrapp. Jeremy is a graduate of Columbia University’s Fu Foundation of Engineering and Applied science in Chemical Engineering and holds an international MBA from Ben Gurion University of the Negev.
